1.title: 2018 AVP Austin Open
1.plot: From May 18th to 20th, the AVP's first stop on the 2018 Tour is to the second largest state in the country, Texas. The capital city of Austin playing host to high level volleyball is nothing new to the area. Combine a knowledgeable population with the country's top pro beach volleyball athletes and this location is sure to be one of the "biggest and best" on the slate.

2.title: 2018 AVP Gold Series: New York City Open
2.plot: The AVP Gold Series - New York City Open from June 8th to 10th is the only one in the Eastern Time Zone and the nation's most populous city as well as the first to occur after the unofficial start to summer (Memorial Day) and the first AVP Gold Series with elevated prize money and points. The NYC event will be a defining one on the 2018 schedule.

3.title: 2018 AVP Seattle Open
3.plot: Seattle is synonymous with coffee, but fans will get their jolt from some intense action in this tournament between June 22nd and 24th. The competition on the courts will be quite a contrast to the serene setting along the shores at Lake Sammamish. As eagles soar in the background, players will be competing to take home the Pacific Northwest AVP trophy.

4.title: 2018 AVP San Francisco Open
4.plot: One of four tournaments held in the state of California, the San Francisco event on July 6th to 8th is unlike the other three. As opposed to the deep sands on the natural beaches in SoCal, this competition takes place on a pier with the scenic Bay Bridge looming overhead. In this event, the cream of the crop always seem to rise.

5.title: 2018 AVP Hermosa Beach Open
5.plot: Hermosa Beach may border Manhattan Beach geographically, but each city has its own identity and history. In the AVP's inaugural season, there was an event in Hermosa Beach, but not Manhattan Beach. Also, the first ever telecast of beach volleyball took place at the Hermosa Beach event. Appropriately, Hermosa Beach falls from July 27th to 29th, right next to Manhattan Beach on the 2018 schedule.

6.title: 2018 AVP Gold Series: Manhattan Beach Open
6.plot: The Manhattan Beach Open happens every year, and every year, 4 athletes get to place their name in history. The AVP Gold Series - Manhattan Beach Open is known as the Super Bowl of beach volleyball: big stage, big money and big reward as AVP stars enshrine their name on the Manhattan Beach Pier. The second tournament of the 2018 Gold Series will be on August 17th to 19th.

7.title: 2018 AVP Gold Series: The Championships in Chicago
7.plot: No city outside of California has hosted more pro beach tournaments than Chicago, which on August 31st to Sept 2nd will add one more with the final AVP Gold Series tournament. Labor Day in Chicago has consistently had packed stands and fierce competition with the Chicago skyline serving as a picturesque backdrop.

8.title: S1.E8 2018 AVP/HTA Hawaii Invitational
8.plot: The 2018 AVP season will culminate with a one-of-a-kind event in Hawaii.

imdb.plot outline: AVP is bringing the sand and stars to cities across the nation, and you have a front row seat to all the beach volleyball action. Watch the best beach volleyball athletes in the world as they compete to win it all on the AVP Tour. Plus, get exclusive access to the athletes and watch the stories that have never before been told.
